DESCRIPTION:
arrange: deploy Anycharm.
    act: integrate Maubot with Anycharm.
    assert: Run action that validates if dashboard is present.
NAME: test_cos_integration

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness and set up all required integration.
    act: run create-admin charm action.
    assert: ensure password is in the results.
NAME: test_create_admin_action_success

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL and a user is added.
    act: run the delete-admin action.
    assert: login fails as the username doesn't exist.
NAME: test_delete_admin_action_success

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize harness and verify that the credentials are set with default values.
    act: set matrix-auth integration.
    assert: matrix credentials are set as expected.
NAME: test_matrix_credentials_registered

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness and set up all required integration except matrix-auth.
    act: run register-client-account charm action.
    assert: event fails.
NAME: test_register_client_account_action_matrix_auth_failed

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot is active and paths.json contains default value.
    act: change public_url with a different path called /internal/.
    assert: api_path contains the extra subpath /internal/ extracted from the
        public_url.
NAME: test_public_url_config

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL.
    act: run the reset-admin-password action.
    assert: the action results contains a password.
NAME: test_reset_admin_password_action_success

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness with handle_exec and
        config.yaml file.
    act: emit container pebble ready event.
    assert: Charm is blocked due to the missing PostgreSQL integration.
NAME: test_maubot_pebble_ready_postgresql_required

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness, set up all required integration
        and create an admin user.
    act: run reset-admin-password.
    assert: ensure password is in the results.
NAME: test_reset_admin_password_action_success

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness and set up all required integration.
    act: run create-admin charm action with reserved name root.
    assert: ensure action fails.
NAME: test_create_admin_action_failed

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness and set up all required integration.
    act: run reset-admin-password.
    assert: ensure action fails.
NAME: test_reset_admin_password_action_failed

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL.
    act: run the reset-admin-password action.
    assert: the action results fails.
NAME: test_reset_admin_password_action_failed[user_not_found]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: deploy Maubot and postgresql and integrate them.
    act: send a request to retrieve metadata about maubot.
    assert: the Maubot charm becomes active once is integrated with postgresql.
        Charm is still active after integrating it with Nginx and the request
        is successful.
NAME: test_build_and_deploy

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL.
    act: run the reset-admin-password action.
    assert: the action results fails.
NAME: test_reset_admin_password_action_failed[root]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness and set up all required integration.
    act: mock API call to succeed and run register-client-account charm action.
    assert: ensure expected data is in the results.
NAME: test_register_client_account_action_success

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL.
    act: run the create-admin action.
    assert: the action results fails.
NAME: test_create_admin_action_failed[user_exists]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize harness and set postgresql integration.
    act: change public-url config.
    assert: charm is active.
NAME: test_public_url_config_changed

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL.
    act: run the delete-admin action.
    assert: the action results fails.
NAME: test_delete_admin_action_failed[user_not_found]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL.
    act: run the create-admin action.
    assert: the action results fails.
NAME: test_create_admin_action_failed[root]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness with handle_exec and
        config.yaml file.
    act: retrieve the pebble plan for maubot.
    assert: ensure the maubot pebble plan matches the expectations,
        the service is running and the charm is active.
NAME: test_maubot_pebble_ready

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL.
    act: run the create-admin action.
    assert: the action results contains a password.
NAME: test_create_admin_action_success

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: after Maubot is deployed and relations established
    act: any-loki is deployed and joins the relation
    assert: pebble plan inside maubot has logging endpoint.
NAME: test_loki_endpoint

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize harness and verify that there is no credentials.
    act: set postgresql integration.
    assert: postgresql credentials are set as expected.
NAME: test_database_created

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL.
    act: run the delete-admin action.
    assert: the action results fails.
NAME: test_delete_admin_action_failed[root]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Maubot charm integrated with PostgreSQL and AnyCharm(matrix-auth)
        and admin user is created.
    act: run the register-client-account action.
    assert: the action results contains a password.
NAME: test_register_client_account_action_success

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness and set up all required integration.
    act: mock API call to fail and run register-client-account charm action.
    assert: event fails.
NAME: test_register_client_account_action_api_failed

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: initialize the testing harness and set up all required integration.
    act: run register-client-account charm action with non-existent user.
    assert: event fails.
NAME: test_register_client_account_action_param_failed

DESCRIPTION: Deploy Maubot and integrations
NAME: test_deploy_stable
